nodes.text: Alert Status 1 was a combat alert status in use by Battle droid personnel aboard the Trade Federation Battleship Saak'ak. During the time of the Invasion of Naboo, it was declared when the Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi and Qui-Gon Jinn were detected in the ship air ducts after having escaped from the conference room when Darth Sidious ordered for them to be executed.
